--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Ares/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark 
Claw/Double Punch/
> Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Dark One landed, Hiss hopping out and Dark One transforming to 
biped mode.
> He activated his comm. link to the base close to him.  "New base, 
this is 
> Dark One of the Alliance.  The two groups of Predacons near you are 
enemies.  
> Fall back and open fire ont hem, we will attack from behind."
> 
> Dark One raised his arm.  "ATTACK!  TAKE NO PRISONERS!"
> 
> Breakdown transformed into his artillery mode, firing off a 3 foot 
long 
> explosive shell in a 10 foot radius of KitKat.

::KitKat::
She heard the shell whistle as it came down. SHe jumped to the side, 
but got knocked down byt he explosion. "SCATTER!!" She yelled to her 
friends. She opened her link,"DESTRUCTOR! WE'RE UNDER ATTACK, YOUR 
ASSISTANCE WOULD BE GREATLY APPRECIATED RIGHT NOW!"
She had burn marks on her sides and some shrapnel in her arm.

> ---
> 
> Pyro transformed into his tank mode, firing off three Fireballs at 
GoldenEye.

::GoldenEye::
She got hit by one fireball, rolled on the ground to put it out and 
missed the other two. She transformed into eagle mode and took to the 
sky. She fired her optic lazars at Pyro. 
> ---
> 
> Hiss transformed into his gun mode, hovering in the air, firing off 
three 
> x-ray blasts at Drill Bit (x-ray blasts damage internal stuff).
> 
> ---
> 
> Scavenger transformed into his HUMV mode, firing off ten bullets 
from both of 
> his moutned cannons, twenty bullets in all heading for KitKat.

::KitKat::
She got hit but ten of the bullets, and drew her cannon and returned 
fire on Scavanger.
> ---
> 
> Sixshot's cockpit opened, Ares leaping out.  The 'bot with the 
mythological 
> deity namesake transformed in mid air, landing on the ground as a 
tank.
> 
> Sixshot pulled up, using his scanners to find targets.
> 
> ---
> 
> Demon Wulf looked to his brothers, Flesh Ripper and Dark Claw.
> 
> Dark Claw transformed into his assault vehicle mode, arming his 
missile 
> launchers.
> 
> ---
> 
> Double Punch went into his stealth mode, his body cloaked.  He 
armed his 
> energy-signature seeking missiles.
> 
> ---
> 
> Injector and Bumblebee launched into the air, both holding stinger 
missile 
> launchers in each hand.
> 
> ---
> 
> Manterror powered up his weapons, taking a position behind a 
boulder, firing  off a single ion disk at GoldenEye.

GoldenEye::
She was just taking off as the ion disk sliced into her leg, leaving 
a deep cut that went half way down into her thigh. She screamed and 
fired her lazars at Manterror.
